title: Behavior Activation Plan
description: Create a personalized plan to engage in rewarding activities that improve your mood

questions.prompt: List 3 activities you used to enjoy but have been doing less of recently:
questions.placeholder: Example: hiking, reading, cooking with friends...

questions.prompt: On a scale of 1-10, how much effort would it take to do one of these activities?
Which of these barriers most prevents you from engaging in enjoyable activities?
options: Feeling like it won't be enjoyable

questions.prompt: Choose ONE small, achievable activity you could do this week:
questions.placeholder: Example: Go for a 10-minute walk, read one chapter, call a friend

questions.prompt: When could you realistically do this activity?
options: I'll schedule it in my calendar now

questions.prompt: How confident are you that you'll complete this activity?
I will need to overcome obstacles to complete this activity.
What might get in your way, and how will you handle it?
questions.placeholder: Example: If I feel too tired, I'll just do 5 minutes instead of giving up entirely

questions.prompt: How will you remind yourself to do this activity?
options: Put a note somewhere I'll see it

questions.prompt: How do you think you'll feel after completing this activity?
questions.placeholder: Example: I'll probably feel proud of myself and more energetic
